data.text: Alatala ɛ Ala na siyane halagi, a naxanye bɔxɔn soma ɛ yii, ɛ e kedima nɛn, ɛ yi dɔxɔ e taane nun e banxine kui.
Na na dangu, ɛ xa taa saxan sugandi bɔxɔni, Alatala ɛ Ala naxan fi ɛ ma.
Ɛ xa kirane rafala siga mɛnne yi, ɛ yi yamanani taxun dɔxɔde saxan, Alatala ɛ Ala naxan fima ɛ ma ɛ kɛɛn na, alogo, faxa tiine birin xa siga na taane yi, e niin yi rakisi.

Naxan na faxan ti, a li, a mi a rakelixi a ma, a mi a yitɔnxi xɔnnantenyani, na kanna nɔɛ sigɛ nɛn na taana nde yi, a niin yi ratanga. Misaala ra, muxun naxan siga fɔtɔnni wudi sɛgɛdeni e nun a lanfana,
a wudin sɛgɛma, bunbin yi koren, a yi a lanfaan li, na yi faxa. Na faxa tiin sifan nɔɛ luyɛ nɛn na taana nde yi alogo a niin xa rakisi.
Xa kirani kuya, faxa muxun gbeeɲɔxɔ muxun faxa tiin sagatanma nɛn a xɔlɔni han a yi a li, a yi a faxa, hali a mi yi lan a yi faxa bayo a mi a lanfaan faxa feni tɔnxi xɔnnantenyani.
N yamarini ito fixi ɛ ma na nan ma. Ɛ xa taa saxan sugandi marakisi taane ra.
Xa Alatala ɛ Ala ɛ bɔxɔn nagbo ayi alo a a kɔlɔ ɛ benbane xa kii naxan yi, xa a bɔxɔni ito birin so ɛ yii a ɛ benbane tuli sa naxan na,
xa ɛ yamarini itoe birin suxu a faɲin na, n naxanye falama ɛ xa to, a ɛ xa Alatala ɛ Ala xanu, ɛ yi bira a kirane fɔxɔ ra, nayi ɛ mɔn xa taa saxan sugandi, ɛ yi e sa taa saxanna bonne fari.
Nayi, Alatala ɛ Ala dɛnaxan fima ɛ ma ɛ kɛɛn na, ɛ mi tɔɲɛgɛtɔɔn faxɛ na bɔxɔni.
Koni xa muxuna nde a boden naɲaxuxi, a a mɛlɛn, a yi a faxa, xa na kanna siga na taana nde yi,
na taan fonne lan nɛn e xa a suxu, e yi a xali faxa muxun gbeeɲɔxɔ muxun fɛma alogo a xa a faxa.
Ɛ nama kininkinin na kanna ma de! Ɛ xa na faxa ti sifan ɲan Isirayila bɔxɔni, ɛ yi hɛrin sɔtɔ.
Ɛ na dɔxɔ bɔxɔni Alatala ɛ Ala naxan fima ɛ ma ɛ kɛɛn na, ɛ nama ɛ lanfana bɔxɔn danna taxamasenne masiga ɛ benbane naxanye dɔxɔ.
Muxun naxan bata hakɛn liga hanma gbalona hanma yulubina, na kanna mi lan a xa kiti muxu kedenna sereya baxin xɔn. Na fe sifan makitima sereya firin hanma saxan fala xuiin nan xɔn.
Xa sere ɲaxin sereyaan ba, a yi muxun tɔɲɛgɛ gbalona nde a fe ma,
yɛngɛ fa firinni itoe lan nɛn e xa siga Alatala batu yireni saraxaraline nun kitisane fɛma naxanye walima na waxatini.
Kitisane a feen fɛsɛfɛsɛma nɛn. E na a kolon a seren bata wule sereyaan ba, a a ngaxakedenna tɔɲɛgɛ,
nayi ɛ xa a liga na kanna ra alo a tan yi a ligama a ngaxakedenna ra kii naxan yi nun. Ɛ xa fe ɲaxin ɲan ɛ tagi.
Muxu gbɛtɛne na feen mɛma nɛn, e yi gaxu. Nayi, e mi fa susuɛ na fe ɲaxin sifan ligadeni sɔnɔn.
Ɛ nama kininkinin na muxu sifan ma: Niin ɲɔxɔn xa fi niin na, yɛɛn yi ɲɔxɔ yɛɛn na, ɲinna yi ɲɔxɔ ɲinna ra, yiin yi ɲɔxɔ yiin na, sanna yi ɲɔxɔ sanna ra.
